snippet.title: Arto - Official Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Developer Orion Games introduces Arto, a colorful, visually stylized action RPG that sees you inject life into a colorless world as you battle dozens of different enemy types across half a dozen biomes, upgrading your character and items along the way. Arto is in development for PC with no release date announced just yet. Wishlist it on Steam at https://store.steampowered.com/app/1906510/Arto/

#IGN #Gaming
